char_info.char_desc: The Siren Who Swims at Fast Speeds

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: No amount of damage can degrade our beauty. My husband always looks forward to seeing me every day.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kagami:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Same with Driller when I get the chance...

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Even if I'm stuck in this hideous condition,

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm confident my original short hair is acceptable for most peoples desires.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: They think my image is handsome.
